name: Alliance for Childhood European Network Foundation
membership: The Alliance for Childhood is a member of Eurochild and of the European Policy Centre.
goal:
- To increase the respect for childhood as a
basis for human development and to create
awareness of the needs of all children.
• To develop and inspire ideas for solutions to
those problems which could endanger the
good quality of childhood.
• To provide a platform for contacts,
inspiration, exchange, peer learning,
encouragement and dialogue among policy
makers, decision makers, researchers,
practitioners, parents and all people that
have an influence on children’s lives.
interests: Culture, Education, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives:
The work of DG EAC, EMPL and JUST
The Intergroup on Child Rights at the European Parliament
